group.label: General Settings for Ajax Search Autocomplete

field.label: Enable Ajax Search
field.comment: Enable/Disable Search Auto Complete.

field.label: Enable Product Search
field.comment: Enable/Disable Product Search, if enabled, ajax search will return products matching the search term.

field.label: Minimum number of characters to search
field.comment: Set the minimum number of characters which customers should enter to trigger autocomplete. Example: 3

field.label: Maximum number of items displayed
field.comment:
Set the maximum number of items displayed in the dropdown list. Example: 3
Note: For Display Results are set Horizontally the maximum number of items can be up to 8.

field.label: Show Product Image
field.comment: Show/Hide the product image in the dropdown results list.

field.label: Width of the product image
field.comment: Set the width for the products images in the dropdown results list [pixels]. Example: 80

field.label: Show Product Description
field.comment: Show/Hide product description in the dropdown results list.

field.label: Maximum number of words for the description
field.comment: Set te maximum number of words displayed for product description in the dropdown results list. Example: 10

field.label: Show product price
field.comment: Show/Hide product price in the dropdown results list, if a promotion is enabled, the discounted price will show here. Once the promotion is over, the normal price will show.

field.label: Custom text when no results
field.comment: Set your custom text to be displayed if there is no search results. Example: Sorry, no results were found.

field.label: Head custom CSS/HTML
field.comment: Insert custom header text to be displayed in the dropdown results list. You can also insert CSS/HTML for design adjustments of product search header section.

field.label: Footer custom CSS/HTML
field.comment: Insert custom footer text to be displayed in the dropdown results list. You can also insert CSS/HTML for design adjustments of product search footer section. Note: Sample footer custom CSS uses image located under SearchAutoComplete/view/frontend/web/images/img-footer.svg, if needed you can use any other images from your server.

field.label: Enable Popular Suggestions
field.comment: Enable/Disable Popular suggestions. (default Magento)

field.label: Enable Category Search
field.comment: Enable/Disable Category Search, if enabled, ajax search will return categories matching the search term.

field.label: Maximum number of categories displayed
field.comment: Set the maximum number of categories displayed in the 'Categories' list. Example: 3; If not set, all the results will be displayed.

field.label: Width of results container
field.comment: Set the width of the results container [pixels]. Example: 250

field.label: Display Results
field.comment: Select how the results are displayed. See tooltip for more details.
field.tooltip: Horizontal option only available with Search V2 from Pearl Theme. Check your search version in WeltPixel -> Custom Header -> Search Options -> Search Version

field.label: Show Product Divider
field.comment: Show/Hide Product Divider.

field.label: Divider Color
field.comment: Set color for divider used to separate ajax product results in search container, example #CCCCCC

field.label: Search container background color
field.comment: Set color for search container, example #FFFFFF

field.label: Container Text Color
field.comment: Set color for product results text in search container, Example #000000

field.label: Title Background Color
field.comment: Set background color for search container titles like Product Results, Popular Suggestions, Example: #F0EFF0

field.label: Title Color
field.comment: Set text color for search container titles like Product Results, Popular Suggestions, Example: #000000
